description: Audit manuel des mcq_answer du GS v8 contre les PDF sources des annales FFE + correction

methodology.approach: Extraction des grilles de reponses (4 UV) depuis les PDF annales texte-extractables (dec2024, jun2025), puis mapping sequentiel des groupes de questions GS vers les grilles. Cross-reference systematique Q text vs choices via docling_mcq_reference pour detecter les mismatches.

jun2025.description: Q text from one UV paired with choices from a different UV. Systematic extraction bug. All 20 removed.

jun2021.description: Same Q/choices mismatch pattern as jun2025, plus duplicate questions and broken data (empty/garbage choices).

findings.mcq_answer_accuracy: 100% verified on dec2024 (59/59). No evidence of systematic mcq_answer errors.
findings.uv_label_swaps: annales_source.uv has rules/clubs inversions in many sessions. Metadata label only, does not affect Q/A content.
findings.previous_31pct_error_rate: FALSE. Caused by UV label swap leading to wrong PDF grid lookup.
findings.recall_at_5_37pct: REAL retrieval problem, not GS quality issue.
findings.q_text_choices_mismatch: 43 questions removed (20 jun2025, 23 jun2021). Pattern: question TEXT extracted from one UV, CHOICES from another UV. Concentrated in jun2025 and jun2021 sessions.
findings.clean_sessions: dec2019, dec2021, dec2022, dec2023, dec2024, jun2022, jun2023, jun2024 show no Q/choices mismatch issues.
